author: Pam Key, Pam Key
title: Susan Rice: Trump Admin Is 'Race-Baiting' by Using 'Wuhan Virus' Term
description: Tuesday on MSNBC's "Andrea Mitchell Reports," former National Security Adviser Susan Rice said it was "shameful" for members of President Donald Trump's administration to race-bait by calling the coronavirus pandemic the "Wuhan virus," in reference to where t…
